alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 03 at 6:33PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Tooele County through 715 PM MDT... At 632 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 16 miles south of Wendover to 7 miles east of Dugway Proving Ground Test Range. Movement was north at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong cross winds can be expected along I-80 across the Bonneville Salt Flats. Blowing dust and salt will reduce visibility to less than one half mile at times. Locations impacted include... Wendover, Dugway Proving Ground Test Range, Utah Test and Training Range South, Knolls, Clive, Utah Test and Training Range North and Bonneville Salt Flats. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 1 and 68. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
